name: Churches
description: Charleston is the Holy City for a reason! Experience the beautiful architecture and rich history of the many churches of Charleston.

name: Haunted
description: Charleson is home to some of the most haunted places in the United States. Gird your loins and see for yourself if the ghosts are real. If you dare.
